Projects

songbird52.com

  • Target: A static webpage advertising local, solo guitar performance. The client anf I decided on about 10 videos and several photos in addition to the inital text content from his previous website.
  • Obstacles: The media was hosted on Facebook and I didn't the client's profile as relevent enough to his buisiness to warrant linking offsite. I migrated them off Facebook and hosted them in an Amazon S3 bucket.
